name: cert-warden
description: Certwarden is a self-hosted certificate management tool designed to simplify issuing and renewing Let's Encrypt certificates. It provides a web dashboard to manage certs and integrates with ACME challenges and DNS services.
features: Certificate Management: Simplify SSL/TLS certificate lifecycle. Easy management.
Let's Encrypt: Automatic certificate issuance and renewal. Free SSL.
Web Dashboard: Manage all certificates from browser interface. Visual control.
ACME Integration: Support for ACME challenges and DNS validation. Flexible verification.
Renewal Automation: Never worry about expired certificates. Set and forget.
Multi-Domain: Manage certificates for multiple domains. Centralized management.
Self-Hosted: Keep certificate management in-house. Security control.
